name: CSU Spur Water in the West Symposium
content: Water in the West Symposium 2022: World water solutions The Water in the West Symposium will focus on global successes and solutions in water and how these solutions might be applied in the American West. The Symposium will be hosted over two days, beginning with a keynote lunch on Wednesday, Nov. 2 and concluding at noon on Thursday, Nov. 3\. Attendees will enjoy locally-sourced food and drink at a reception the evening of Nov. 2, hosted at CSU Spur in conjunction with Regenerate 2022\. Tours of Spur included! The Symposium will be hosted at the Seawell Ballroom in downtown Denver, with virtual options available; to view the agenda and speaker list, and to register, visit csuspur.org/witw. Tickets https://go.evvnt.com/1360584-0?pid=4868 Price: General Admission: USD 40.00 Dates and Time: Starts: Wed, Nov 2, 2022 (12:00 PM) and Ends: Thu, Nov 3, 2022 (12:00 PM) Venue details: Seawell Ballroom at the DCPA, 1350 Arapahoe Street, Denver, Colorado, 80204, United States
